attributes.action: Make Rule Brittania the national Anthem of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Rule Brittania has a lot more cultural and historical importance as it links to Britians history of sea fairing and the Imperial era, and by choosing this we choose to accept the few wrong doings of our ancestors and also choose to be proud of our past in stead of hiding it under a mediocre and generic Anthem about the ruling monarch.
attributes.background: Replace God Save the Queen with Rule Brittania

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
